name: AWS Bedrock
notes: Cost Explorer API, CloudWatch metrics (InputTokenCount, OutputTokenCount, Invocations), CUR export to S3. Supports cost allocation tags for per-project attribution.

name: GCP Vertex AI
notes: Cloud Billing API, BigQuery billing export with SKU-level line items, Cloud Monitoring API for token usage and latency. Supports labels for cost attribution.

name: OpenAI
notes: Usage API (/organization/usage) provides token-level data by model and API key. Response headers include token counts. CSV export from dashboard. No real-time cost API -- costs computed asynchronously.

name: Anthropic
notes: Every response includes usage object with input/output token counts (including cache tokens). Admin API for org-level usage. CSV export from console. Must calculate costs from token counts yourself.

name: ElevenLabs
notes: Usage character-stats endpoint with daily breakdown. Subscription quota tracking. No programmatic billing or cost API -- subscription managed via dashboard only.

name: Leonardo.ai
notes: User info endpoint returns remaining credits. No usage history API, no billing API, no export. Credit-based pricing with dashboard-only consumption history.

name: Runway
notes: No billing or usage API. Credit-based subscription model. All cost and usage tracking confined to the web dashboard. No export capability.

name: Runware
notes: Returns cost field per API response, but no aggregated usage history endpoint, no billing API, no export. You must build your own tracking by logging per-request costs.

name: Marqo
notes: Index statistics (document count, storage) via API. No billing or cost API. Infrastructure-based pricing (per-index, per-hour). Dashboard-only billing visibility.

name: Soundraw
notes: Subscription-based flat-rate pricing. No public API for billing or usage tracking. Purely a SaaS subscription managed through the website.

name: MiniMax
notes: API responses include input/output token counts. No usage history API, no billing API, no export. Must self-instrument by logging per-request tokens and multiplying by published rates.

name: Black Forest Labs
notes: Creators of FLUX. No dedicated billing or usage tracking API. If accessed through partners (Replicate, fal.ai), the partner's billing APIs apply instead. Direct API has no cost or usage endpoints.
